body_html:
This keyword argument has been available since 60dfe88, which includes TensorFlow versions 0.8 and later.

Can you try the following at a Python shell and report the results?

  • import tensorflow as tf; print tf.__version__
  • help(tf.Variable)
body_text:
This keyword argument has been available since 60dfe88, which includes TensorFlow versions 0.8 and later.
Can you try the following at a Python shell and report the results?

import tensorflow as tf; print tf.__version__
help(tf.Variable)
body:
This keyword argument has been available since https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/60dfe8852cfd9565e622e423098bdad746dc3aee, which includes TensorFlow versions 0.8 and later.

Can you try the following at a Python shell and report the results?
- `import tensorflow as tf; print tf.__version__`
- `help(tf.Variable)`
